content:
Sure, here's a text with in-text citations and IEEE reference style references:

Zomato is an online restaurant discovery and food delivery platform that provides users with a variety of services, including a comprehensive database of restaurants, ratings and reviews, online ordering, and table reservations. The company was founded in India in 2008 and has since expanded to over 25 countries worldwide [1]. Zomato's restaurant content management system collects and aggregates data from multiple sources, providing users with a wealth of information about dining establishments worldwide [2].

One of the most popular features of Zomato is its rating and review system, which allows users to share their experiences and opinions on restaurants
